name: Arcadia (itch) (npinsker)
description:
Legends tell of the Game Genie, a guardian said to grant wishes for anyone skilled enough to find him.  Guarded by the Three Arcade Kings, the genie is said to only reveal himself to true game masters.

One night, a young detective wanders into an arcade, looking for clues...

(Made for the 2019 GMTK game jam, with the theme "only one". Arcadia is an adventure game with only one screen, and the arcade games all use only one button.)

Controls

- Arrow keys (or WASD) to move

- Space bar (or Enter) to confirm, advance dialog, and interact with minigames

- Escape (or Backspace) to exit minigames

Credits

- code by Nathan, art by Diana, overworld theme by Anderson

- Rhythm Tappo music is "Jackpot", by TheFatRat

- Font is Daniel Linssen's m3x6

- Bfxr for some sound effects
